threads.title: Just got my copy, can't wait to play

posts.author: commadelimited
posts.body: I finally got my copy in the mail and I'm really keen to try it out. Anyone else got theirs yet? Have you played, and what are your thoughts?

posts.author: clownfeet
posts.body: Played it last weekend. Was excellent. Went down really well, taught the game in about 10 mins and everyone really got into it.Also it looked ace building up the town!!!

posts.author: commadelimited
posts.body: Yes, excited to hear that. I've got some friends coming over tomorrow for gaming. We've already got our main game picked, but I'm hoping we might also be able to include Positano.

383190.reason: 近期《Positano》上榜的主要原因是因為其新版本的推出和玩家的熱烈反響。從討論串中可以看出，許多玩家剛收到遊戲並表達了期待與興奮，且已有玩家分享了良好的遊玩體驗，這顯示出遊戲在玩家社群中的受歡迎程度。此外，遊戲在大型展會如Origins和GenCon的展示也引起了廣泛關注，進一步提升了其知名度和市場需求。這些因素共同推動了《Positano》的上榜。
